questions.question: What is a reason that Victor decides to take French as his elective class?

choices.answer: He is going to France on a class trip.
Spanish would be boring because he already speaks it.
He hopes to be in Teresa's French class.
All the other electives are taken.

questions.question: Why does Michael scowl all the time?

choices.answer: Girls he doesn't like keep bothering him.
Reading GQ magazine made him angry.
He is a mean person in general.
He is trying to imitate male models to impress girls.

questions.question: What can you infer about Victor and Michael having to pick grapes in order to buy clothes?

choices.answer: They don't have parents to buy clothes for them.
The don't have a lot of money.
Their families own a winery.
They are very vain about their appearance.

questions.question: How does Gary Soto use action to show us that Victor feels shy around Teresa?

choices.answer: His brown face blushed when he bumps into her.
Victor waits behind for a chance to bump into Teresa.
Victor wishes he had asked Teresa about her summer.
Victor says Teresa's name in English demonstrate a noun.

questions.question: What can we infer about Victor when he spends his lunch time looking around outside for Teresa?

choices.answer: He is bored and has nothing to do.
He is a stalker and might be dangerous.
He is very sneaky and would make a good spy.
His crush on Teresa runs very deep.

questions.question: Why did Victor raise his hand when Mr. Bueller asked if anyone knew how to speak French?

choices.answer: He thought it would be funny to pretend he spoke French.
He misunderstood Mr. Bueller's question.
He wanted to impress Teresa.
He had learned a few phrases from movies he had watched.

questions.question: "Great rosebushes of red bloomed on Victor's checks." this is an example of:

choices.answer: The author showing not telling.
The author using figurative language.
The author is using a metaphore.
All of the above.

questions.question: What surprise twist occurs at the climax of the story?

choices.answer: Teresa knows how to speak in French as well.
Mr. Bueller thinks that Victor's French is outstanding.
Teresa thinks Victor's French is good and wants his help.
Victor asks Teresa out in French.

questions.question: Why does Mr. Bueller decide not to tell Teresa that Victor doesn't really know French?

choices.answer: He wants Victor to embarrass himself further tutoring Teresa
He feels that Victor has a natural ability for languages.
He didn't really hear what Victor was saying anyway.
He remembers trying to impress girls in his past.

questions.question: What is a possible theme statement from "7th Grade" by Gary Soto?

choices.answer: Putting on a scowl is a good way for boys to attract girls.
Knowing French is a good way for boys to attract girls.
Sometimes an unexpected event can bring two people together.
Lying is a good way for boys to attract girls.
